title: Gramm Tourpacking Optics Hip Bag
content:
Born from Berlin-based bagmakers, Gramm Tourpackingâ€˜s love for birding, this padded hip bag keeps your precious optics safely at your side while riding. Super stable on the hips while riding, then sling it around on the shoulder strap to get at your glass and get the shot.
